title: A brand, Titio erepta On the fift day of Nouember last, before the Honourable Lordes of his Maiesties Priuie Councell, and the graue iudges of the law, &c. this sermon preached by the Reuerend Father in Christ, William, Lord Bishoppe of Rochester.
author: Barlow, William, d. 1613.
publisher: Imprinted by Iohn Windet for Mathew Law,
notes: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
